originalText.text: My son has been attending Mygym for about 2 years now, he’s 3.5 now. It’s the absolute highlight of his week. There’s a huge selection of classes and schedules, and the unlimited package is completely worth it. They have great events for the kids on top of the scheduled courses every couple months or so. The coaches have the patience of saints, and are so kind with the children. Honestly, it’s such a gem of a place to have to take your child to in the city, so you always have something to do.

originalText.text:
My 3yo went to a birthday party here
yesterday and it was INCREDIBLE!!! From the moment we arrived RJ and Kelsey were warm, inviting and professional. The activities they had planned for the kids kept them engaged, active and entertained. PERFECT party location here in NYC - especially in the cold weather as it’s tough to be outside and our kids still have loads of energy to burn. I’m excited to look into the classes they have. Thanks again RJ and Kelsey for such a FUN Sunday afternoon!!!

originalText.text: I am the grandmommie of Blair Reed who celebrated his birthday at My Gym on Sunday. It was great from start to finish. Coach RJ and his partner (a young lady whose name I forgot) were wonderful! Their activities were so creative and inspirational for the kids. Kept them very busy and active which they needed these very cold days. I am most appreciative.

originalText.text: I had my daughters 2nd birthday party here a few weeks ago. The staff was so nice and the activities were great for the children. They help me setup my party decorations ( I was told I could drop it off earlier but was rushing so I could not.) definitely will be back for their classes. I just wish they had a few more options that fit my schedule. But I definitely recommend them for parties! My daughter had a wonderful time.

originalText.text: Before having a child I always knew I wanted to do some type of mommy&me class. When I found the MyGym Harlem location I knew this was going to be the place where I can come with my son Josiah. This location is always clean and the equipment is constantly being rotated. My son has been going to MyGym Harlem since he was 9 months old. He absolutely loves it ! I love how much independence he’s gained and all the friends we have. Josiah has such a great relationship with all the coaches. It’s so sweet walking in every morning being greeted on a first name basis. At 18 months old Josiah has memorized the circle time routine, so we even do it at home now. If you are considering MyGym Harlem definitely try it out, you won’t regret it.
